Repocket

Monetize your unused internet bandwidth. Repocket allows you to earn passive income by sharing your internet connection.

Sign Up Now How to Set Up

About Repocket

App Details

Category: Bandwidth Sharing
Monthly Earnings: $5-20
Payment Methods: PayPal, Bitcoin, Ethereum
Minimum Payout: $10
Platforms: Windows, macOS, Android
Setup Difficulty: Easy
Resource Usage: Low
Referral Program: 25% of referral earnings

Pros & Cons

Pros:

  • High referral commission (25%)
  • Cryptocurrency payment options
  • Clean user interface
  • Good customer support
  • Transparent earnings dashboard
  • Low resource usage
  • Easy to set up and use

Cons:

  • Newer service with less track record
  • Lower earnings in some regions
  • Limited platform support
  • Higher minimum payout than some competitors
  • Earnings can fluctuate based on demand

How Repocket Works

Repocket works by allowing you to share your unused internet bandwidth with the company's network. This bandwidth is then used for various legitimate business purposes such as:

  • Web intelligence gathering for businesses
  • Price comparison and monitoring
  • Ad verification and brand protection
  • Market research and competitive analysis
  • Content delivery and website performance testing

The app runs in the background on your devices and only uses bandwidth that you're not actively using. You earn credits based on the amount of data shared, which can then be converted to cash once you reach the minimum payout threshold of $10.

How to Set Up Repocket

1

Create an account

Visit the Repocket website and sign up with your email address.

2

Download the app

Download and install the Repocket application on your preferred device(s).

3

Start earning

Open the app and start earning immediately. No additional configuration required.

4

Cash out

Once you reach the minimum payout threshold of $10, you can cash out via PayPal or cryptocurrency.

Sign Up for Repocket

Earnings Calculator

repocket-earnings-calculator.js 
          
            <span class="line-number">1</span>// Repocket Earnings Calculator
<span class="line-number">2</span>function calculateRepocketEarnings(devices, hoursPerDay, referrals) {
<span class="line-number">3</span>  // Base earnings per device per hour (in dollars)
<span class="line-number">4</span>  const baseRatePerHour = 0.0035;
<span class="line-number">5</span>
<span class="line-number">6</span>  // Earnings multiplier based on location (example values)
<span class="line-number">7</span>  const locationMultipliers = {
<span class="line-number">8</span>    'US': 1.5,
<span class="line-number">9</span>    'UK': 1.4,
<span class="line-number">10</span>    'Canada': 1.3,
<span class="line-number">11</span>    'Australia': 1.3,
<span class="line-number">12</span>    'Germany': 1.2,
<span class="line-number">13</span>    'France': 1.2,
<span class="line-number">14</span>    'Other': 1.0
<span class="line-number">15</span>  };
<span class="line-number">16</span>
<span class="line-number">17</span>  // Default to 'Other' location
<span class="line-number">18</span>  const locationMultiplier = locationMultipliers['Other'];
<span class="line-number">19</span>
<span class="line-number">20</span>  // Calculate device earnings
<span class="line-number">21</span>  const dailyEarnings = devices * baseRatePerHour * hoursPerDay * locationMultiplier;
<span class="line-number">22</span>  const monthlyEarnings = dailyEarnings * 30;
<span class="line-number">23</span>
<span class="line-number">24</span>  // Calculate referral earnings (25% of referred users' earnings)
<span class="line-number">25</span>  // Assuming each referral has 1 device running 12 hours per day
<span class="line-number">26</span>  const referralEarnings = referrals * 0.25 * baseRatePerHour * 12 * 30 * locationMultiplier;
<span class="line-number">27</span>
<span class="line-number">28</span>  // Total monthly earnings
<span class="line-number">29</span>  const totalMonthlyEarnings = monthlyEarnings + referralEarnings;
<span class="line-number">30</span>
<span class="line-number">31</span>  return {
<span class="line-number">32</span>    deviceEarnings: monthlyEarnings.toFixed(2),
<span class="line-number">33</span>    referralEarnings: referralEarnings.toFixed(2),
<span class="line-number">34</span>    totalEarnings: totalMonthlyEarnings.toFixed(2)
<span class="line-number">35</span>  };
<span class="line-number">36</span>}
<span class="line-number">37</span>
<span class="line-number">38</span>// Example calculation
<span class="line-number">39</span>const earnings = calculateRepocketEarnings(2, 12, 3);
<span class="line-number">40</span>console.log(`Device Earnings: $${earnings.deviceEarnings}`);
<span class="line-number">41</span>console.log(`Referral Earnings: $${earnings.referralEarnings}`);
<span class="line-number">42</span>console.log(`Total Monthly Earnings: $${earnings.totalEarnings}`);

Frequently Asked Questions

What is Repocket and how does it work?

Repocket is a passive income app that pays you for sharing your unused internet bandwidth. The bandwidth is used for various legitimate business purposes like web intelligence gathering, price comparison, and content delivery.

Is Repocket safe and legitimate?

Yes, Repocket is a legitimate company that follows strict privacy and security standards. The app doesn't access your personal data or browsing history, and only uses your excess bandwidth for legitimate business purposes.

How much can I earn with Repocket?

Earnings vary based on your location, internet speed, and how many devices you use. On average, users earn between $5-20 per month with 2-3 devices running continuously. Users in the US, UK, and other high-demand countries tend to earn more.

Will Repocket slow down my internet?

Repocket is designed to use only your excess bandwidth, so most users don't notice any significant slowdown. The app includes settings to limit bandwidth usage if needed.

How do I get paid from Repocket?

Once you reach the minimum payout threshold of $10, you can withdraw your earnings via PayPal, Bitcoin, or Ethereum. Payments are typically processed within 1-3 business days.

Start Earning with Repocket Today

Join thousands of users who are already earning passive income by sharing their unused internet bandwidth.
